summary: Some 401(k) plans now offer the option to invest in crypto assets like bitcoin. While all investments have risks, our analysis shows that investment in selected crypto assets is uniquely volatile. The potential for high returns can come with considerably high risk. Available industry data suggests that 401(k) investment in crypto assets remains low. But the Department of Labor still doesn't have the data to...
title: 401(k) Plans: Industry Data Show Low Participant Use of Crypto Assets Although DOL's Data Limitations Persist
